metadata.title: Grider - Free Photo Grid Maker | Create Stunning Layouts
metadata.description: Make beautiful photo grids in seconds. Pick a layout, customize spacing and corners, download as PNG. No signup needed!

editor.title: Design your grid
editor.subtitle: Tap to add photos, drag to rearrange
editor.fillAllSlots: Add photos to all slots first

section1.title: What we collect
section1.content: Grider works entirely in your browser. All photo editing happens on your device - we never upload, store, or access your photos. Your images stay with you.

section2.title: Cookies & Ads
section2.content: We show ads through Google AdSense. Google might use cookies to personalize ads based on your browsing. You can turn this off in Google's ad settings.

section3.title: Analytics
section3.content: We may use analytics to see how people use our site. This helps us make things better. All data is anonymous.

section4.title: External links
section4.content: We might link to other sites. We're not responsible for their privacy practices.

section5.title: Security
section5.content: Since everything runs locally in your browser, your photos never leave your device. We take security seriously for any data we do handle.

section6.title: Questions?
section6.content: Got questions about this policy? Reach out through our site.
